attributes.action: For Naloxone to be made available by Pharmacy etc for people involved with DOC.
attributes.additional_details: NHS England/Swanswell/General Pharmacy Council/Police. Anyone involved with drug users etc..thank you.
attributes.background: People are dying without having Naloxone available. A short course/access by people who come into contact with OD'd patients will help save lifes

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the accessibility of Naloxone but we’re not sure whether you'd like it to be available in all pharmacies or whether you'd like training to be made available for police and other groups.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
